body:
Hi Theodore,

Just a quick update. Bo Lin, one of my colleagues at Penn State (who now works with Leland!), actually did his dissertation on a similar theme. Although I don't think referred to those statistical methods as ML, but I think you will find a lot of similarity in concepts. I think his dissertation is open source: [https://etda.libraries.psu.edu/catalog/27233](https://etda.libraries.psu.edu/catalog/27233)



Sarith
